mean_cn: n. 【金融】透支，【金融】透支额；  v. 【金融】透支
mean_en: the amount of money that you owe to a bank when you have spent more money than is in your bank account; an arrangement that allows you to do this
sentence: I took out an overdraft to pay for my new things.
sentence_trans: 我透支了自己的卡来买新东西。
word_etyma: over过度 ＋ draft提款 → overdraft[金融]透支，透支额
